name: Kawatare
description:
Kawatare is a 3D adventure game based on the Fukushima Daiichi disaster. Taking place a month after the incident, the game provides a post-disaster scenario in which through its exploration, the player will discover more about the protagonist, the city, and its inhabitants. 

The game alternates between an isometric camera when we're on the streets and a camera that's in one of the corners of the room when we're indoors. 

The experience can be enjoyed both on a keyboard and mouse and Playstation and Xbox controllers.

WORLD

Mei wakes up in her hometown but has no memories of her past, only knowing that she was returning home from her school before passing out and waking up there. With that in mind, she decides to find her way back to reunite with her parents.

LANGUAGES

  • Brazilian Portuguese - Available 
  • English - Available soon
